title: Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ 1.12.0 released!
content: We are very pleased to announce the 1.12.0 release of Quarkus Tools for IntelliJ. This release improves the Quarkus wizard and Quarkus run experience but also aligns with LSP4MP 0.5.0 and quarkus-ls 0.12.1. Improved Quarkus wizard The Quarkus wizard can be used from File → New → Module → Quarkus....
